    public abstract class LocationPolygon
extends AbstractUnitPolygon<rst.domotic.unit.location.LocationDataType.LocationData,org.openbase.bco.dal.remote.layer.unit.location.LocationRemote>
    A Polygon that represents different kinds of locations.
